Plot Prognostic Model Evaluation Figures

Source: R/Figure.R
figure_pro.Rd

Generates and returns a ggplot object for Kaplan-Meier (KM) survival curves or time-dependent ROC curves.

Usage

figure_pro(type, data, file = NULL, time_unit = "days")

Arguments

type

"km" or "tdroc"

data

list with:

  • sample_score: data.frame(time, outcome, score)

  • evaluation_metrics: for "km" needs KM_Cutoff; for "tdroc" needs AUROC_Years (numeric years like c(1,3,5), OR a named vector/list like c('1'=0.74,'3'=0.82,'5'=0.85))

file

optional path to save

time_unit

"days" (default), "months", or "years" for df$time

Value

ggplot object
